name: Bananarang: The Scattered Shards (itch)
description:
For 2$ CAD, you'll receive:

-An awesome SNES-style game for PC

-A PDF player's guide with 70+ pages of tips, tricks, and trivia

-The complete soundtrack album, containing all 58 original tracks from the game

...

Initial release: October  21st, 2022

Franchise: Bananarang

T - Teens and above (Fantasy violence, bloodshed, comical shenanigans, disturbing imagery)
